channel.title: Encrypted Password Help
channel.description:
My passwords are encrypted, for example: if a username's password was lol123, it would be like 34resdgsdgs4trf, and I want to know how I can fix that so I can see what there password is.
Regards, James

item.title: Encrypted Password Help
item.dc:creator: @recker450 recker450
item.description:
@recker450 wrote:

go here
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/tutorials/228427-adding-md5-encryption.html
and undo it =D
ive removed md5 before but im not sure how anymore i think i know how do it if i had a devo source with md5

Read full topic

item.title: Encrypted Password Help
item.dc:creator: @IfearI IfearI
item.description:
@IfearI wrote:

euhm i don’t really know but try some stuff out and undo the encrypting (MD5?)

Some stuff i found

int loadgame = loadgame(playerName, passHash(playerPass));

(delete passHash, which maybe encrypts it?)

characterfile.write(passHash(playerPass), 0, passHash(playerPass)
					.length());

(also delete passHash?)

I’m sure there is more…

Just search some stuff and mess around with it

Hope It helps a little

Read full topic
